resources.string: Just tap on hambruger menu(in the top right corner of the home activity. It will be denoted by three parallel and horizontal lines.

To login into moodle , just go to menu-->Login to COEP Moodle section. There you will be presented with a form asking you \"Username\" and \"Password\". Just enter the necessary values and click on \"SIGN IN\" button. You will be automatically redirected COEP Moodle website and logged in to COEP Moodle
If your login fails by saying \"Invalid Login\", go back to login page and enter correct details

For accessing moodle after you have logged in succeessfully, just click on \"Go to COEP Moodle\" option from the menu.Please note that , last entered loginID and password are saved in the app. So you don\'t have to login again after your login was successful! After a successful login, you just have to select \"Go to COEP moodle \" option from menu every time you want to see moodke.DO NOTchange the information via login page after successful login. After successful login, you should always use \"GO to COEP Moodle\" option.
Still have doubts/isssues ??Contect the developer. See the about page of the app from the menu.
